description: Gets a metadata form type in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this metadata form type exists.

parameters.name: formTypeIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when this metadata form type was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created this metadata form type.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this metadata form type exists.

nested_items.name: imports
nested_items.description: The imports of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: smithy
nested_items.description: Indicates the smithy model of the API.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: originDomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the metadata form type was originally created.

nested_items.name: originProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the project in which this metadata form type was originally created.

nested_items.name: owningProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the project that owns this metadata form type.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the metadata form type.
